```pddl
[
  '(:action purchase
    :parameters (?user - user ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?user ?location) (for_sale ?item ?location))
    :effect (and (purchased ?item ?user) (not (for_sale ?item ?location)))',
  
  '(:action attach
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?target - location)
    :precondition (and (possessed ?item ?agent) (at ?agent ?target))
    :effect (and (attached ?item ?target) (not (possessed ?item ?agent)))',
  
  '(:action clean
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?tool - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (attached ?tool ?agent) (dirty ?target))
    :effect (and (clean ?target) (not (dirty ?target)))'
]
```
